Key Match Events: Mustafa Meshaal, Al Moez Ali, and Gaber AbdulSallam scored goals for Qatar
India made two substitutions with Rahul KP and Ishan Pandita coming in for Sunil Chhetri and Chhangte
India tried to create chances through Subhashish, Sahal Abdul Samad, and Mahesh but failed to convert them
Post-Match Reflections: India endure their first defeat after coming into the tie with a 1-0 away win over Kuwait
Qatar's winning run in FIFA World Cup qualifiers continues
The Blue Tigers then try to build a counter but the attack fizzles out right after the centre line
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place at the Kalinga Stadium in Bhubaneswar
India lost 0-3 to Qatar in the FIFA World Cup qualifier
Qatar scored their third goal as Waad Albayati sent in a cross from the left, which was headed inside the post by Gaber AbdulSallam
